author: Libby Cathey
title: Coronavirus government response updates: Anyone coming close to Trump must get tested
description: President Donald Trump continues to resist a nationwide stay-at-home directive, despite his nation's top official stressing more candidly that it's key to saving lives.
content: As the coronavirus task force weighs additional measures to take amid the pandemic, including whether to recommend facial coverings in public and possible domestic flight restrictions, President Donald Trump continues to resist a nationwide stay-at-home direc… [+4787 chars]
